title: Mobin Donuts: Crafting a Distinctive Brand Identity
description: This project focused on building a cohesive brand identity for Mobin Donut, a Canadian donut brand that prioritizes local ingredients and community connection.

title: CassCycle: Enhancing the 2nd Shopping Experience
description: This project focuses on improving secondhand shopping experiences by addressing user pain points like slow seller responses, trust issues, and inefficient search filters.

title: Eatery: Responsive Website for a Modern Restaurant
description: A responsive website for a modern restaurant, featuring a seamless user experience, JavaScript functionality, and a refined design to adapt beautifully across devices.

title: KAVi: Redefining Portable Coffee Brewing
description: Showcased an all-in-one thermal bottle and coffee brewer through engaging visuals, brewing guides, and interactive customer campaigns.

title: LMS Golf Wear: Branding for a Celebrity Collaboration
description: Golf Wear’s branding project was emphasized its innovative designs and collaboration with Christopher Lee.

title: TIANNLI: E-Commerce Website for Premium Dried Fruits
description: Designed TIANNLI’s website, focusing on user-friendly layouts, branding alignment, and seamless shopping experiences. Worked with HTML, CSS, and platform customization.

title: Toli Culi Pali: Elegant Utensil Set for Fine Dining
description: Launched VIIDA’s colourful utensil set with photoshoots and social media campaigns, highlighting ergonomic design, macaron colours, and the elegance of dining rituals.

title: VIIDA: Shopify Website for Lifestyle Products
description: Created a global Shopify website for VIIDA with a clean, minimalist design using soft grey and white tones for a smooth and safe feel.

title: UIU Straw x OldHouseFace: Nostalgic Taiwanese Visual
description: Showcased the unique UIU Straw in collaboration with OldHouseFace, highlighting Taiwan’s diverse architectural heritage through nostalgic visuals.

title: Petronew: Online Shop for Pet Health Supplements
description: Designed and launched an e-commerce website and visual identity for Petronew, integrating magic-inspired branding, professional healthcare colors, and optimized user experience.
